patterns: What is the purpose of eBaybayMo?
What can I do with eBaybayMo?
responses: eBaybayMo is a community-driven app and website that brings Baybayin to life, connecting tattoo artists, t-shirt designers, scholars, and enthusiasts with Filipino script heritage. It offers a Baybayin community, marketplace, and translation features.

Baybayin is an ancient Filipino writing system used before Spanish colonization, primarily by Tagalog and other ethnic groups. It’s an abugida with 17 characters—3 vowels and 14 consonants—where symbols change with diacritic marks to represent syllables. Documented in the 16th century, it was used for letters, poetry, and records. Today, it’s a symbol of Filipino cultural heritage, revived in art and education.

patterns: How does the eBaybayMo community work?
Can I join the Baybayin community?
What’s the community feature in eBaybayMo?
How can I connect with Baybayin enthusiasts?
Is there a place to post Baybayin designs?
Can I comment on posts in eBaybayMo?
How do I interact with the Baybayin community?
What can I do in the community section?
How do I share my Baybayin learnings?
responses: The Baybayin community in eBaybayMo lets users connect, share Baybayin scripts, post designs, comment, and learn together with others passionate about Filipino heritage.

patterns: What items are available on eBaybayMo?
Can I order shirts with Baybayin?
How do I shop on eBaybayMo?
responses: eBaybayMos marketplace, run by the ComSoc organization, offers Baybayin-inspired products like shirts, cups, and mugs. Users can order and pick up items at the ComSoc office.

patterns: How do I order on eBaybayMo?
What’s the process to buy products?
How can I get my order?
How do I pick up my order?
Where do I pay for my order?
What’s the status of my order?
responses: To order on eBaybayMo, select a product, place your order, and pick it up at the ComSoc office the next day with walk-in payment. You can cancel pending orders and review products.

patterns: Does eBaybayMo have a messaging feature?
How do I contact the seller?
Can I message ComSoc on eBaybayMo?
How do I track my order on eBaybayMo?
Is there a chat feature in eBaybayMo?
How can I communicate with the seller?
Can I send a message about my order?
Where’s the message section in eBaybayMo?
How do I talk to ComSoc?
Is there a way to chat in the app?
responses: eBaybayMos messenger feature lets you contact ComSoc, track orders, and communicate directly with the seller through the app or websites message section.

patterns: What is the ComSoc organization about?
What does ComSoc do for students?
Is ComSoc for computer science students?
responses: ComSoc is an organization for Computer Science students aimed at building a community to enhance skills in programming, problem-solving, and computer-related fields, preparing them for industry or research careers. It also manages eBaybayMo’s marketplace, selling Baybayin-inspired products like shirts, cups, and mugs.

patterns: Are there Baybayin classes by SaPaSu?
responses: SaPaSu is an organization partnered with eBaybayMo, focused on spreading Baybayins beauty through free classes at BISU-Bilar campus.

patterns: Can I convert Baybayin to Latin letters?

Can I learn Baybayin through translation?
responses: eBaybayMo offers a Baybayin-to-Latin letters translation feature, currently being enhanced to translate Baybayin to Latin words for better accuracy.

patterns: What payment methods does eBaybayMo accept?
Can I pay online for my order?
How can I pay for my purchase?
Is cash payment available on eBaybayMo?
responses: eBaybayMo currently supports walk-in payment at the ComSoc office. Online payment options are not available yet, but you can pay in cash when you pick up your order.

patterns: What products are available right now?
Can I check product stock on eBaybayMo?
responses: You can check product availability on the eBaybayMo marketplace. Common items like Baybayin shirts, mugs, and cups are usually in stock, but it is best to confirm through the app or website.

patterns: What are the delivery options on eBaybayMo?
Can I have my order delivered to my address?
responses: eBaybayMo currently does not offer delivery. Orders must be picked up at the ComSoc office the next day after placing your order.

patterns: How do I return an item on eBaybayMo?
What if I get a defective product?
Is there a refund option on eBaybayMo?
responses: eBaybayMo allows returns for defective products. Contact ComSoc through the messenger feature to arrange a return or replacement. Refunds are not available, but you can exchange the item.

patterns: What features does the eBaybayMo app have?
Can I use eBaybayMo on my phone?
What’s new in the eBaybayMo app?
Does the app have a marketplace?
How do I navigate the eBaybayMo app?
responses: The eBaybayMo app includes a Baybayin community for sharing and commenting, a marketplace to buy products, a messenger feature to contact sellers, and a Baybayin-to-Latin translation tool.

patterns: What features does the eBaybayMo website have?
Can I use eBaybayMo on my browser?
What’s new on the eBaybayMo website?
Does the website have a marketplace?
How do I navigate the eBaybayMo website?
responses: The eBaybayMo website offers the same features as the app: a Baybayin community, marketplace, messenger, and translation tool, all accessible through your browser.

patterns: Are there Baybayin classes on eBaybayMo?
Can I learn Baybayin through eBaybayMo?
Does SaPaSu host workshops on eBaybayMo?
How can I join a Baybayin workshop?
responses: Through its partnership with SaPaSu, eBaybayMo promotes free Baybayin workshops at BISU-Bilar campus. Check the community section for announcements about upcoming classes.

patterns: Can I customize a Baybayin shirt?
Can I request a personalized Baybayin product?
How do I customize a product on eBaybayMo?
Is customization available for Baybayin items?
responses: eBaybayMo does not currently offer customization for Baybayin products. You can choose from pre-designed shirts, cups, and mugs available in the marketplace.

patterns: How do I contact eBaybayMo support?
Who do I reach out to for help on eBaybayMo?
Is there a support team on eBaybayMo?
How can I get help with my order?
Where can I report an issue on eBaybayMo?
responses: You can contact eBaybayMo support through the messenger feature on the app or website. Reach out to ComSoc for assistance with orders or other issues.
